Uses of Interface
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.Contig

  • Packages that use Contig 
    Package Description
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly
    The assembly package contains objects for working with genomic data that has been assembled into Contigs and Scaffolds.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.ca.asm
    Contains Classes and interfaces to work with Celera Assembler data.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.ace
    This package contains classes for handling Contigs stored in the Ace File Format.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.nav  
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.contig
    This package contains classes that can read and write TIGR .contig formatted contig data (also known as .ctg format).
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.tasm
    This package contains classes to handle TIGR Assembler formatted assembly files.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util
    The Assembly util package contains utility classes that are useful for working with general assembly data regardless of what assembler was used or file format the data is in.
    org.jcvi.jillion.experimental.ncbi.submit.assemblyArchive  
    org.jcvi.jillion.internal.assembly  
    org.jcvi.jillion.internal.assembly.util  

    • Uses of Contig in org.jcvi.jillion.assembly

      Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.assembly with type parameters of type Contig 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractContigBuilder<P extends AssembledRead,C extends Contig<P>>
      AbstractContigBuilder implements the ContigBuilder interface
      interface  ContigBuilder<R extends AssembledRead,C extends Contig<R>>
      ContigBuilder is a Builder for Contigs that allows creating a contig object by adding placed reads and setting a consensus.
      interface  ContigDataStore<PR extends AssembledRead,C extends Contig<PR>>
      ContigDataStore is a marker interface for a DataStore implementation which stores Contigs of the same type.

    • Uses of Contig in org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.ca.asm

      Subinterfaces of Contig in org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.ca.asm 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  AsmContig 
      interface  AsmUnitig
      A Unitig is a special kind of contig whose length is "as long as possible" until the assembler found a contradiction.

      TasmContigBuilder(Contig<? extends AssembledRead> copy)
      Create a new TasmContigBuilder instance setting the initial contig state to have the same contig, id, and underlying reads as the given contig.
